claw.tatsu.primitive

Class Function

  • java.lang.Object
    • claw.tatsu.primitive.Function

  • public final class Function
extends java.lang.Object
    Primitive transformation, test and utility for Function related action. This includes: - Find arguments in function call. - Find id in function definition or in ancestor.
    Author:
    clementval

    • Method Detail

      • findArg

        public static Xnode findArg(Xnode fctCall,
                            java.lang.String argName)
        Find specific argument in a function call.
        Parameters:
        fctCall - Function call node to search in.
        argName - Name of the argument to be found.
        Returns:
        The argument if found. Null otherwise.

      • findId

        public static Xid findId(FfunctionDefinition fctDef,
                         java.lang.String name)
        Find the id element in the current function definition or in parent function definition if nested.
        Parameters:
        fctDef - Function definition.
        name - Id name to be searched for.
        Returns:
        The id if found. Null otherwise.

      • findDecl

        public static Xnode findDecl(FfunctionDefinition fctDef,
                             java.lang.String name)
        Find the declaration element in the current function definition or in parent if nested.
        Parameters:
        fctDef - Current function definition.
        name - Declaration name to be searched for.
        Returns:
        The element if found. Null otherwise.

      • readPromotionInfo

        public static PromotionInfo readPromotionInfo(FfunctionType fctType,
                                              InsertionPosition insertionPosition)
        Read the promotion information stored in function type.
        Parameters:
        fctType - Function type to read from.
        insertionPosition - Insertion position to be applied. Null to keep original insertion position.
        Returns:
        Promotion information object with read information.

      • gatherAssignStatements

        public static java.util.List<AssignStatement> gatherAssignStatements(FfunctionDefinition fctDef)
        Gather all assignment statements in the function definition.
        Parameters:
        fctDef - Function definition in which statements are gathered.
        Returns:
        List of assignment statement in AST order. Empty list if function definition is null or no statement found.
